main_title_arabic: مرحبا بك في لوحة التحكم الخاصة بك،
title_content: Here you’ll find all that you need about your bundles and much more.
title_content_arabic: ستجد هنا كل ما تحتاجه حول باقاتك وأكثر​

process_content.questionnaire: Fill out questionnaire to continue the design process!
process_content.questionnaire_edit: You have {} to edit your questionnaire
process_content.questionnaire_edit_content: If not edited, we will start designing your brand immediately.
process_content.design_brand: We are now working on your unique brand!
process_content.approve_brand_content: We’ve finished working on your stunning brand!
process_content.addons: We’re almost done! Enter the content of your applications.
process_content.receive_designs: We’ve received your content and working on finishing your brand!
process_content.file_send: We’ve sent you your brand files and content!
process_content.questionnaire_edit_content_arabic: إذا لم يتم التعديل ، فسنبدأ في التصميم على الفور .
process_content.design_brand_arabic: نحن الآن نعمل عل تصميم هويتك البصرية
process_content.receive_designs_arabic: لقد تلقينا المحتوى الخاص بك ونعمل على إنهاء هويتك البصرية
process_content.file_send_arabic: لقد أرسلنا لك ملفات الهوية البصرية  ومحتواها !

rate_us_content: We care about your satisfaction, let us know your thoughts!
